1.0.name: wordpress/share-icons
1.0.description:
This plugin is super simple and allows you to choose which share buttons you want displayed: * Facebook Like * Twitter Tweet * Stumbleupon Stumble * Reddit Vote/Submit

If you have any questions or comments about the plugin Or you are looking to hire a professional web developer Or you would like to see my other creations then please visit (http://jusarg.com/ "My Site") Jusarg.com!
